about_the_game:
If you are looking for something new, "Quad Battle"has got you covered!
"Quad Battle" is a party-style MOBA game where 16 players can go head-to-head in a strategic showdown. Blending elements from auto-battlers, monopoly and all the things that make multiplayer arena fun. This game's got everything you need for a unique experience.

4v4v4v4 Mayhem: Seize the Map!

A new revolutionary 4 teams, 16 player battle system on a randomly generated battlefield. Make sure your friends and you are ready both for action points and strategic preparations.

Time your moves and build your deck!

All players can use action points to determine their moves and positions. Work as a team and pick your line-up accordingly. Once the battle engages, it's all hands free from that point on.

Real-Time Tactics: Surround, Ambush, Raid, Block!

Every team fight is a tactical operation requiring strong communication. Use the complex, shifting terrain to your advantage, predict the movements of both allies and foes, choose the best positions and paths, and work closely with your teammates to dominate the battlefield, take down opponents, and capture key points.

Never Give Up!

Remember, in the rumble, the last team stands wins. Hold your fort, hold your line, counter, attack and remember, everything is possible in Quad Battle.
detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game

If you are looking for something new, "Quad Battle"has got you covered!
"Quad Battle" is a party-style MOBA game where 16 players can go head-to-head in a strategic showdown. Blending elements from auto-battlers, monopoly and all the things that make multiplayer arena fun. This game's got everything you need for a unique experience.

A new revolutionary 4 teams, 16 player battle system on a randomly generated battlefield. Make sure your friends and you are ready both for action points and strategic preparations.

Time your moves and build your deck!

All players can use action points to determine their moves and positions. Work as a team and pick your line-up accordingly. Once the battle engages, it's all hands free from that point on.

Real-Time Tactics: Surround, Ambush, Raid, Block!

Every team fight is a tactical operation requiring strong communication. Use the complex, shifting terrain to your advantage, predict the movements of both allies and foes, choose the best positions and paths, and work closely with your teammates to dominate the battlefield, take down opponents, and capture key points.

name: Quad Battle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: intel core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeFore GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
